permissions: Allowed when the time card exists and either TimeCardPolicy#create_or_approve? returns true, or the user is a manager member of the customer and the customer is associated with the time card trucker, or the time card approval_process is "field" and the job production plan identifies the user as a time card approver.
side_effects: Creates a time card scrappage action and transitions the time card status to scrapped.
validation_notes: --time-card is required. The referenced time card must exist; it must be in editing or submitted status, have zero customer and broker value, and its status cannot change if the time card is already associated with an invoice.
